name: Mr. Stickman - Office Simulator
description:
Submitted to the 16th Mini Jame Game.

Description:

Mr. Stickman has grown tired of working a generic office job.

In fact, he's grown tired of his boss. Maybe the entire office.

Maybe not Jerry (poor Jerry...).

"Work" as Mr. Stickman and "follow" basic office procedures. "Respect" office property and carry around totally inconspicuous scissors in your hand for absolutely no reason at all. Explore the office; maybe find out what's behind your boss's secret vault.

Maybe you'll even get a raise. 

Who are you kidding? 

These scissors won't use themselves.

You can always fix it later (if you feel like it).

Control Rules

Do not use A or D to move from your office space.
Do not left-mouse click to interact with any of the office objects.
DO NOT BOTHER THE BOSS IN HIS OFFICE.

Tip:
If you haven't gotten the idea yet, don't follow any of the rules.

Credits:

Imated - Programming

Dessey - Programming

bytenightmare - Art
